Subjective: Tired for 2 months. Fatigue all day. Sleeps a lot but wakes up tired. No clear cause. No trauma. No shortness of breath. No chest pain. No snoring. No allergies. No unusual palpitations. Normal appetite. Stable weight. Normal stools. Normal peeing. No other symptoms. Request: Wants to know if something is wrong with body.
Objective: BP: 110/60. HR: 40-60. Lungs: clear. Back: pain in lower back. Abdomen: normal peristalsis. No gross abnormalities.
Assessment: Unexplained fatigue. Possible anemia. Possible thyroid issue. Inflammation check pending.
Plan: Blood tests: anemia, thyroid, inflammation. Follow-up phone appointment after results. Schedule phone appointment with doctor. Get test results the day after test. Call doctor the day after test to discuss results.
